title: Senior Web Developer
job_overview:
Position Overview:
We are seeking a highly experienced Senior Web Developer to join our team on a gig/part-time basis. As a Senior Web Developer, you will lead the development, customization, and optimization of websites, ensuring high performance, functionality, and seamless user experience. Experience with WordPress is a must, Bricks Builder or Webflow is a strong advantage.

Company:
We are a forward-thinking digital marketing and web solutions agency, primarily serving North American clients. Our team thrives on delivering cutting-edge web development solutions that align with our clientsâ€™ needs while keeping up with the latest design and functionality trends.

Responsibilities:
- Design, develop, and manage custom websites tailored to client specifications using WordPress Elementor Pro.
- Customize themes, plugins, and third-party integrations to enhance website functionality, including E-commerce.
- Ensure mobile-first, responsive designs with an emphasis on speed optimization and SEO-friendly development.
- Utilize Bricks Builder or Webflow for website creation where necessary, and customize user interfaces for optimal client satisfaction.
- Collaborate closely with designers, marketers, and other stakeholders to deliver cohesive and visually engaging websites.
- Conduct regular website maintenance, updates, and performance optimizations.
- Debug and troubleshoot issues related to website functionality, hosting, and plugins.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest web development technologies, especially related to WordPress.
- Manage client communication, providing progress updates, technical advice, and recommendations.

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a Senior Web Developer, with a strong portfolio of completed projects.
- Proficiency in WordPress, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL, with the ability to build and customize themes and plugins for WordPress.
- Strong understanding of mobile-first design.
- Understanding of SEO best practices, responsive design, and web performance optimization.
- Excellent communication skills in English, both written and verbal.
- Ability to work independently and remotely with minimal supervision.
- Experience working with North American clients is a plus.

Location:
Remote position open to candidates based in the Philippines.

Schedule:
Gig or Part-time. Flexible hours depending on project requirements and deadlines.

Benefits:
- Competitive compensation based on experience and project scope.
- Opportunity to work on diverse web development projects across various industries.
- Professional growth and development in web development and related technologies.
- Flexible work schedule and remote working environment.

How to Apply:
Interested candidates are invited to send a message with their resume and portfolio showcasing relevant web development projects.
